title: 148864064.multitasking At Work
excerpt: Anyone’s whose ever tried to juggle will tell you how difficult it is to do three things at once.

children.text: Anyone’s whose ever tried to juggle will tell you how difficult it is to do three things at once.
And yet many bosses’ expect their employees to juggle all the time.
Tripling the possible errors. Quintupling the potential for cruft.
Why not one topic? Why not one task?
One at a time is plenty.
